changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW DN_AGE_DAYS AS select dn.discrepancy_note_id, ROUND (SYSDATE - (SELECT date_created FROM discrepancy_note WHERE parent_dn_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and discrepancy_note_id = (select max(discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note where parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id))) as days, ROUND((SELECT date_created FROM discrepancy_note WHERE parent_dn_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and discrepancy_note_id = (select max(discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note where parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id) ) - dn.date_created)as age from discrepancy_note dn where dn.parent_dn_Id is null;

changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW DN_AGE_DAYS AS select dn.discrepancy_note_id, ROUND (SYSDATE - (SELECT date_created FROM discrepancy_note WHERE parent_dn_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and discrepancy_note_id = (select max(discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note where parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id AND dn.resolution_status_id != 4 AND dn.resolution_status_id != 5))) as days, ROUND((SELECT date_created FROM discrepancy_note WHERE parent_dn_id=dn.discrepancy_note_id and discrepancy_note_id = (select max(discrepancy_note_id) from discrepancy_note where parent_dn_id = dn.discrepancy_note_id) ) - dn.date_created)as age from discrepancy_note dn where dn.parent_dn_Id is null;
